abstract: A new movie, "50/50," makes clear what every cancer patient already knows: Cancer may be life-changing, but it doesn't necessarily change your life.
snippet: A new movie, "50/50," makes clear what every cancer patient already knows: Cancer may be life-changing, but it doesn't necessarily change your life.
lead_paragraph: This weekend I saw the movie "50/50," the story of a young cancer patient who faced even odds of surviving his disease. I wasn't sure I wanted to see a cancer movie -- after all, I see cancer often enough in real life on the oncology ward where I work.

headline.main: A Hollywood Movie Takes on Cancer
